comment: The radius of convergence of the (formal) derivative ` H ` of the power series ` G ` is (at least) as large as the radius of convergence of ` G ` . This version of ~ dvradcnv uses a shifted version of ` H ` to match the sum form of ` ( CC _D F ) ` in ~ pserdv2 (and shows how to use ~ uzmptshftfval to shift a maps-to function on a set of upper integers). (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 22-Apr-2020.)
